entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `ref` field support in .NET runtimes #63768
    7.0.0
  • Possible race condition in Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.Memory #63764
  • [Draft] Planned .NET 7 work for System.Text.Json #63762
    7.0.0
  • System.Runtime.InteropServices.Tests is causing large core dumps on macOS #63761
  • `System.Tests.PosixSignalRegistrationTests.SignalCanCancelTermination` is occasionally failing on macOS #63760
    7.0.0
  • Having Issue Running System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection Methods in .NET 6 - Alpine Linux (Docker) #63759
  • GenAPI needs to account for ref fields #63751
    7.0.0
  • We could improve the list of known headers & values #63750
  • [wasm][aot] Windows: Assertion failure - `unexpected GC filler class` in `System.Runtime.Numerics.Tests` #63749
  • Developers can use System.Text.Json to serialize type hierarchies securely #63747
    7.0.0
  • [tvOS][arm64] Vector128Tests.Vector128NIntSumTest/Vector128NUIntSumTest failed on the rolling build #63746
  • System.Text.Json serialize exception with AllowNamedFloatingPointLiterals #63740
  • HttpListenerContext.AcceptWebSocketAsync unsupported for IWindowsPrincipal in .NET Core 3.1 #63738
  • `JsonNumberHandling.WriteAsString` doesn't work when serializing `JsonElement` #63735
  • API Proposal: Generic System.Math Functions #63732
  • [dotnet-sdk-7.0.100-alpha.1.22060.9] grandnode2 thrown exception due to EntriesCollection property missing from Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.Memory.dll #63731
  • Build Subset Dependencies #63729
  • Remove CheckForOverflowUnderflow #63725
    Future
  • Abort() in ManagedWebsocket can't really abort socket when underlying TCP is half open #63724
  • [mono][windows] System.Drawing.Common.Tests fails on the rolling build #63723
    7.0.0
  • Arm64: Performance swing in MicroBenchmarks.Serializers.Xml_ToStream<Location> #63748
  • Test failure GC\\API\\GC\\GetAllocatedBytesForCurrentThread\\GetAllocatedBytesForCurrentThread.cmd #63717
  • Test failure JIT/Regression/JitBlue/Runtime_34587/Runtime_34587/Runtime_34587.sh #63716
  • SocketsHttpHandler: GOAWAY on connection handshake #63715
    7.0.0
  • Analyzer for `System.Runtime.CompilerServices.DisableRuntimeMarshallingAttribute` #63714
    7.0.0

Closed

  • [tvOS] System.Runtime.Serialization.Xml.ReflectionOnly.Tests: System.ExecutionEngineException : Attempting to JIT compile method while running in aot-only mode. #60462
    7.0.0
  • Q: AOT and composite type reflection #63670
  • System.Text.Json Merge #31433
    Future
  • JsonNode feedback #55827
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Make digest size constants public #63130
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Add more extensive control over ignoring properties #55781
    7.0.0
  • System.Text.Json: How to serialize only certain properties without using JsonIgnoreAttribute #593
    7.0.0
  • Equivalent of DefaultContractResolver.CreateProperties override in System.Text.Json #60518
    7.0.0
  • DateTime ToString wrong delimiter for culture danish #63727
  • Open up metadata infrastructure of System.Text.Json #34456
    7.0.0
  • 6.0 source-build servicing builds are not producing all runtime libs/packages #63451
  • [API Proposal]: Peek queue index #63257
    Future
  • .NET 6 - dotnet publish doesn't recognize RID any #63728
  • Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjections 6.0 is not compatible with netcoreapps 2.1 and 3.0 #63744
  • JsonSerializer polymorphic serialization and deserialization support #30083
    7.0.0
  • NetworkInterface.GetAllNetworkInterfaces on Android Throws Null Exception #58374
    7.0.0
  • System.Net.NetworkInformation needs Android PAL #51303
    6.0.MAUI
  • System.Net.NetworkInformation.Functional.Tests fails on Android #50567
    7.0.0
  • [Perf] Changes at 12/8/2021 8:10:20 AM #63741
  • Regex conditional groups are broken if no "else" expression is given #24894
    Future
  • JsonSerializerOptions.GetConverter Returns ObjectDefaultConverter, Insted of Expected Null #63444
  • Add json deserialize interface attribute to specific class #63436
    7.0.0
  • Consider special-casing `== ""` in the JIT? #63719
  • Assertion failed '(info.compCompHnd->getClassAttribs(fldCls) & CORINFO_FLG_VALUECLASS) == 0' during 'Do value numbering' #62108
    7.0.0
  • Invalid field sequence in value numbering #62178
    7.0.0
  • BadImageFormatException when loading valid assembly #63639
  • Extra stloc and ldloc in switch statement compared to if statement #10343
    Future
  • [wasm] System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransformApi tests fail on windows/helix #52136
    7.0.0
  • ICloneable with generics support #63707
  • ActivityContext.TryParse should support IsRemote #42575
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add BitArray.CopyTo(Span<byte>) #62680
  • API Proposal: ShiftLeft, ShiftRight for Vector<T> #20510
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • [Group 2] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Options` #63767
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Options, community-contribution
  • "MOffset" size estimate fix #63766
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update StructMarshalling design now that DisableRuntimeMarshallingAttribute is approved #63765
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Add JIT support for control-flow guard on x64 and arm64 #63763
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement hash and HMAC stream one shots #63757
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, cryptographic-docs-impact
  • Extend regex switch alternation optimization to IgnoreCase #63756
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Build all packages on source-build even when in servicing #63755
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • MemoryMappedFile: don't check for file existence if there is no need #63754
    area-System.IO, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Perform some minor code cleanup of the System.Numerics and System.Runtime.Intrinsics namespaces #63753
    area-System.Numerics
  • Actually properly type primary selectors #63752
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] [wasm][debugger] Fixing error after receiving loaded_files = null #63739
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Add IsKnownConstant jit helper and optimize 'str == ""' with str.StartsWith('c') #63734
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Set zero (infinite) options timeout in case of Timeout.InfiniteTimeSpan #63733
    area-System.Net.Quic, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Debuger tests refactor 63667 #63730
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Begin using the xplat hardware intrinsics in BitArray #63722
    area-System.Collections
  • Fix compilation with older gcc #63721
    community-contribution
  • JIT: simple forward substitution pass #63720
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Temporarily disable coredumps during library testing on macOS #63742
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add negative tests for all by-refs in UnmanagedCallersOnly scenarios. #63711
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • Add public constants for HMAC and hash sizes #63685
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, cryptographic-docs-impact
  • [release/6.0-vs4mac] Fix the MacOS remote unwinder for VS4Mac #63758
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Change non-breaking spaces (U00A0) to a plain space in code files #63688
    community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Use "read" to fetch misaligned 64bit values from bundle header #63519
    Servicing-approved, area-Single-File, 6.0.3
  • Fix the MacOS remote unwinder for VS4Mac #63405
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.2
  • Disable System.Drawing.Common.Tests test suite on Windows+Mono #63726
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [Android] Throw PNSE for unavailable network information #63633
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Reconfigure the field sequences for statics #62632
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Bump to macOS 10.14 minimum in libs and mono builds too #63682
    area-Build-mono
  • [wasm] Improve NodeJs + ESM workaround for require function #63718
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Fixing error after receiving loaded_files = null #63591
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Add NativeAOT libraries tests annotations #63668
  • Fix JsonObject constuctor #63150
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Load assets earlier #63623
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Remove constraints from Regex source generator partial class declaration #63637
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Add ActivityContext.TryParse overload #63692
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Diagnostics.Activity, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Build all packages when in source-build #63653
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix native frame unwind in syscall on arm64 for VS4Mac crash report. #63598
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Implement the last of the approved cross platform hardware intrinsics, except shuffle #63414
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation

Updated

  • Faster IndexOf for substrings #63285
    area-System.Memory
  • [WIP] Fix gc_heap::remove_ro_segment #63473
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Enable superpmi-collect pipeline on macOS arm64 #63691
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Avoid deadlock with ConfigurationManager #62209
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Introduce Activity.IsStopped Property #63713
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Diagnostics.Activity, 7.0.0
  • Extend System.Runtime.Intrinsics.X86 to support nint and nuint #63594
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Remove string allocation from XmlTextEncoder.WriteCharEntity #61774
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • [Draft][Mono][Test] Collapse mono runtime tests into single builds using global-build-job template #62863
    area-Infrastructure
  • [LoongArch64] JIT/EE interface for getting ABI-info #62893
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-loongarch64
  • [mono] Hot Reload: initial push to support adding lambdas #63513
    area-EnC-mono
  • [wasm] Switch default modules to es6 #62740
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Fix escaped strings for TryGetDateTime(Offset) #63534
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Improve static field access for NativeAOT #63620
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Skip flaky DllImport tests on Mac #63636
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Implement System.Runtime.CompilerServices.DisabledRuntimeMarshallingAttribute on CoreCLR-family of runtimes/type systems #63320
    area-Interop-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Implement IEquatable<T> on value types overriding Equals (and enable CA1066/CA1067) #63690
    new-api-needs-documentation
  • Update SAN test to account for OpenSSL 3 changes #63655
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] [source-build][mono] Do not build Microsoft.NET.Runtime.MonoTargets.Sdk #63701
    Servicing-approved, area-Build-mono, 6.0.3
  • Validate behavior of ProcessInfo command before and after suspension point #63382
    test enhancement, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • NativeAOT: ICustomMarshaller #62921
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Split `sendtohelixhelp.proj` to extract wasm, and mobile bits to separate files. #63373
    area-Build-mono
  • [WIP]Port MD4 managed implementation from mono/mono #62074
    area-System.Security
  • Fix x86 stackwalk for UnmanagedCallersOnly #61075
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix broken callstacks in interpreter on MonoVM. #60338
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [release/6.0-maui] [Android] Fix accessing network interfaces information #63628
    area-System.Net
  • Search native code in all R2R ni.dll in version bubble #57277
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Do not set `GTF_NO_CSE` for sources of block copies #63462
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Added support for StepThroughAttribute #63679
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • Preserve `OBJ`/`BLK` on the RHS of `ASG` #63268
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Compress operand kinds array and optimize `OperIsLocal` #63253
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Delete `GT_DYN_BLK` #63026
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Don't reuse registers in Edit-n-Continue mode #63698
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Handle embedded assignments in copy propagation #63447
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Address-expose locals under complex local addresses in block morphing #63100
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Exception sets: debug checker & fixes #63539
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Refactor optimizing morph for commutative operations #63251
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Build ILCompiler NuGet packages #63212
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Serialize SendPacketsAsync tests #63702
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • [wasm] WebSocket tests on NodeJS #63441
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, needs-author-action, 7.0.0
  • Update runtime.json with manjaro information #63338
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Morph `ASG(ONE_FLD_STRUCT, CALL)` using `BITCAST` #61049
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Reading beyond EOF should return 0 for FILE_FLAG_NO_BUFFERING #63625
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Avoid unnecessary string allocation in HttpRuleParser.GetHostLength #63641
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Reduce the memory footprint of HttpHeaders #62981
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Avoid allocating byte array when setting ALPN list on Linux #63674
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [Group 5] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Json` #63694
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Add ProcessLinkerXmlBase to NativeAOT #63666
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add blsr #63545
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Improve Directory.Move and DirectoryInfo.MoveTo #63675
    area-System.IO, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr/debug and part of inc directory. #62886
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • 62606 Return fully qualified path from FileSystemEventArgs #63051
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • NativeAOT: Allow Delegate and MulticastDelegate marshalling #63219
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] add the coreclr/pal directory #62887
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Improve reductions for Regex empty / nothing nodes #63695
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • [Arm64] Don't use D-copies in CopyBlock #63588
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use static abstract interface methods in SymbolicRegexMatcher #63546
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-vm directory #62885
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-13
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Can we produce package artifacts #1792
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Question: ILScanner and Generics test #1783

PullRequests

Merged

  • Merge from dotnet/runtime #1819
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Double timeout as the job is running close sometimes over, the limit #1820
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Include clr.wasmjit subset when building on windows for x64 #1818

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Don't copy additional files when ReferenceOutputAssembly=false for exe references #23420
  • With .NET 7 SDK, create razor project failed with error when running PerfView #23410

PullRequests

Created

  • Update 6.0.2xx to the 6.0.102 version of the SDK #23423
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Better caching for RazorSourceGenerator when SuppressRazorSourceGener… #23419
    Area-AspNetCore
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.2xx' => 'main' #23411
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • [release/6.0.2xx] Update man pages #23351
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Update man pages #23350
    Servicing-approved
  • userlocal detection: also force last digits to zero for non-preview versions. #23080
    Servicing-approved, Area-Workloads, 6.0.1xx
  • Upgrade Test Platform and fix tests #23409
    Area-DotNet Test
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.2xx' => 'main' #23404
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • [release/6.0.2xx] Backport Improve console output of `dotnet watch` ⌚ (#23318) #23400
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Enable additional test projects to run on helix #23381
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-13
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Allow null conditional (?.) operator on left hand side of assignment #2883
    Backlog
  • Proposal: Ternary comparison operator #4108
    Any Time

PullRequests

Merged

  • Low level struct updates #5602
  • Mention async methods in param-nullchecking spec #5642

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Test plan for Utf8StringLiterals feature. #58848
  • XLF files showing up in deterministic key with different paths #58840
    C# 11.0
  • "display inline parameter name hints" shortcut not working when "Display all hints while pressing Alt+F1" is checked #58839
    Backlog
  • unsuitable extension methods with type parameter is appeared in intellisense #58838
  • Missing CS8970 when applying attribute class having unsupported type arguments from containing type #58837
  • Missing CS8970 when applying attribute alias with unsupported type substitution #58836
  • `OrganizeImportsTests` involving non-English characters are failing locally. #58834
  • Cleanup SolutionEventMonitor type #58827
    Backlog
  • Param-nullchecking crash in EmbeddedTypesManager #58824
  • Formatting option AllowDisjointSpanMerging has no storage and is never set to non-default value #58823
    Backlog

Closed

  • Visual Studio (originally "compiler", my bad) makes the wrong nullability assumption about unannotated code #58641
  • Text editor option for preprocessor directives missing #58681
    Backlog
  • If a method is inaccessible due to its protection level, then Ctrl + . should make it public #58684
  • Fix MEF composition used by Code Style tests #58841
  • Want the `interface` `class` `virtual` `override` keywords clickable #19332
    Backlog
  • Avoid serializing diagnostics for documents that do not support them #47859
    Backlog
  • Avoid setting MICROSOFT_DIASYMREADER_NATIVE_* env variables in tests #57526
    17.1
  • [EnC] Edit and continue fails in method with delegate invocation with > 15 parameters #58782
  • Solution Crawler should suspend operations during solution close #47408
    17.1
  • Stack Trace Explorer pops up unexpectedly #58746
  • Cache delegate for non-capturing local functions when caching delegates for static methods #19431
    Backlog
  • Stack Trace Explorer to surface the option to close each Stack Trace tab #58164
    17.1

PullRequests

Created

  • Port 58785 to dev17.1 #58853
    Area-IDE
  • Update VisualStudioCacheVersion #58852
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add "Utf8 String Literals" to the feature list #58851
    Area-Compilers
  • Support basic end-to-end scenarios for converting string constants to UTF8 byte representation. #58849
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Utf8StringLiterals
  • [draft] IDE response to raw string literals #58846
    Area-IDE
  • draft: Assertion that could help narrow down an issue #58845
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • (Port to 17.0) Merge FixIdDefinition with the same name #58844
    Area-IDE, Needs Shiproom Approval
  • Filter cancellation exceptions in generator driver #58843
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.2
  • Add a helper diagnostic for enforcing IDE0005 (remove unnecessary usi… #58835
    Area-IDE, 17.2
  • draft: dummy change to see what's affected by this code path #58833
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • [semi-auto-props]: Refactor and rename 'AccessingAutoPropertyFromConstructor' #58832
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • [EnC] Store entire spans instead of line deltas #58831
    Area-Interactive
  • Do not return empty nodes in the refactoring helpers service. #58830
    Area-IDE
  • Remove unnecessary lock access setting UIContexts in the workspace #58828
    Area-IDE
  • Fix param-nullchecking crash related to EmbeddedTypesManager #58825
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix emit of param-nullchecking on async methods #58822
    Area-Compilers
  • Avoid unnecessary array creation #58821
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix race in WorkCoordinator when handling document reanalysis #58820
    Area-IDE, Needs Shiproom Approval

Merged

  • Fix statement completion interaction with argument completion #58850
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Readd GetTypesByMetadataName #58813
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1-vs-deps to main #58847
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Add VSTypeScriptFormattingService to external access #58817
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Update the insertion instruction after we remove main-vs-deps #58842
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Remove unnecessary lock access setting UIContexts in the workspace #58818
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix nrt annotations and impl in syntaxfacts #58829
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Avoid setting MICROSOFT_DIASYMREADER_NATIVE_ env variables in tests #58808
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Handle synthesized delegates without refKinds #58802
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Trigger global operation notification during solution close #58805
    Area-Analyzers, Next
  • Reduce Stack Trace Explorer automatic open behavior scope #58819
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to main #58815
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #58816
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Cache the delegate for static method group conversions. #58288
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Handle more stack frames #58769
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Backport SpillSequence Fix to 17.1 #58788
    Area-Compilers, Needs Shiproom Approval
  • Formatter options refactoring - step 1 #58807
    Area-IDE
  • Add GlassTestsHotReloadService external access #58456
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Perform progression search in two phases. #58785
    Area-IDE
  • Revert "Merge pull request #57132 from CyrusNajmabadi/branchId3" #58814
    Area-IDE
  • Remove formatting suppression for tuple syntax #58810
    Area-Compilers
  • Cleanup Renamer.RenameDocumentAction API #58508
    Area-IDE
  • BackgroundAnalysisScope enhancements #57172
    Area-Analyzers, Needs UX Triage
  • Correctly set the VS.Core.Version property #58799
    Area-IDE, Needs Shiproom Approval
  • Completion is not provided inside curly braces settings if the preceeding text contains 'is' #33961
    Area-IDE, Backlog
  • Refactor ISyntaxInputNodes #58800
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • DRAFT: Use the new IBrokeredSettingsManager #40142
    Area-IDE, PR For Personal Review Only
  • Nullable enable LSP project and cleanup #43583
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Convert CSharpSyntaxGenerator to be an incremental generator #54379
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge features/snappy/nodelay to main-vs-deps #55078
    Area-Infrastructure, UX Review Not Required
  • for pr validation #57879
    Area-IDE
  • API for getting a deterministic key for a Compilation #57134
    Area-Compilers
  • Clarify breaking change requirement for constructor in 'struct' with field initializers #58812
    Area-Compilers
  • CA2208 Instantiate argument exceptions correctly #58768
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Mark APIs as shipped #58776
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Rename options refactoring #58403
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • (Suggestion) Blazor: RenderFragment target String #39506
  • [WIP] ASP.NET Core Roadmap for .NET 7 #39504
    7.0.0
  • Allow acr_values and ui_locales to be specified in OpenIdConnectOptions #39503
  • Issue with Multiple Schemes, context.AuthenticateAsync(scheme) not able to authenticate in version 6.0.0 onwards #39500
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper #39497
  • Perf improvement: updates #39496
  • Add support for Blazor Component Extension like C# code extension for reusable components #39494
  • Quarantine StopProcessingNextRequestSendsGracefulGOAWAYThenFinalGOAWAYWhenAllStreamsComplete #39492
  • Expose reason why ValidateAsync in IUserTwoFactorTokenProvider fail #39491
  • Analyzer: warn when marking a route parameter as optional if it isn't at the end of a route #39486
    Backlog
  • [Blazor server 6.0] httpContextAccessor.httpcontext is null when fallback to Long Polling #39485
  • Initializing a new HubConnectionContext for unit tests results in System.NullReferenceException #39484
  • Blazor Server App never frees memory #39483
    .NET 7 Planning
  • .Net6 Blazor SignalR Hub Connection causing high CPU in web browser #39482
  • Quarantine AcceptNewStreamsDuringClosingConnection #39479
  • Quarantine StreamPool_MultipleStreamsConcurrent_StreamsReturnedToPool #39477
  • UseStatusCodePagesWithReExecute should respect [SkipStatusCodePages] #39472
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.App.Ref needs to be produced and versioned correctly in servicing for source-build #39471

Closed
